Package geometrygraphics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    An interface which represents the ability for an object to be drawn to a Graphics object.
    Rotateable
    An interface which represents the ability for an object to be rotated in a 2D space.
    Translateable
    An interface which represents the ability for an objcet to be translated in 2D cartesian space.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoordinatePlanePanel
    A JPanel containing x-y axes.
    GeometryDrawerFrame
    The main JFrame of the program.
    LabelledTextSliderPanel
    A JPanel containing a JLabel, JSlider, and JTextField.
    ShapeBuilderPanel
    A JPanel which can build one type of shape.
    ShapeDrawingPanel
    Holds the list of all Shapes to draw and draws them.
    ShapeFactoryPanel
    Holds all the possible ShapeBuilderPanels, shows a preview of the current Shape or the error message, and provides the buttons to create shapes.
    ShapeInfoPanel
    Displays info about a single Shape, as well as select and remove buttons to get more detailed options or remove the Shape from the drawing.
    ShapePanel
    Holds the main drawing panel, as well as the file IO buttons and the select all button.
    ShapePreviewPanel
    Draws a single Shape.
    ShapeSelectionPanel
    Holds a scrollable list of ShapeInfoPanels, a SingleShapeSelectionPanel, and transform all shape options.
    SingleShapeBuilderPanel
    Holds the sliders required to set arguments for a ShapeBuilder.
    SingleShapeSelectionPanel
    Displays translate and possibly rotate options for a single Shape that has already been created.
    VariableShapeBuilderPanel
    Holds the ShapeBuilderPanels for several variations of builders of a single Shape, with a JComboBox to switch variations.
